overview: John Wigboldus brings over 17 years of experience to his position as VP Sales and Channel Development at Sutus. An entrepreneurial veteran of the technology and telecommunications industry, John has experience that spans operations, marketing, sales, and business development with companies such as TELUS, AT&T International, MetroNet/AT&T Canada, C1 Communications, Radian Communications, Q-media Services, and Voyus/IP Applications. Most recently, as the VP of Sales and Business Development for ADZILLA new media, he oversaw the creation and implementation of the companyâ€™s â€œgo to marketâ€ business development strategy for securing partnerships with ISPs and related technology companies. He has a B.A. from the University of British Columbia and participated in the BCIT Sales and Marketing program.
